name: MonkAuthRegister
description: Register a new tenant and obtain a JWT authentication token. Creates a new tenant database by cloning from a specified template (defaults to 'system' template). The tenant database is isolated and named using SHA256 hashing for environment consistency and privacy. Use this for creating new tenants only - use MonkAuthLogin for existing tenants. Optional parameters include template name (which database schema to clone), username (defaults to 'root'), and description (human-readable tenant info). The JWT token is cached in memory for the entire Claude Code session and automatically included in all subsequent API calls. Token is valid for 24 hours. Returns tenant name, database name, username, and token expiration time. This is a convenience wrapper around MonkAuth with action='register' for the most common tenant creation scenario.
